content: I'm considering switching from 6.100A to 6.100L. Once I switch, could I re-submit assignments/would my grades transfer, or would they not be accepted? I noticed that the syllabus says that if you register late, you would have to use late days for P-Sets, but I was unsure if this also applied in the case that you switch from 6.100A to 6.100L.
subject: Switching from 6.100A to 6.100L

content: I would transfer your quiz scores from 100A, and would give you an extension until Sunday to complete the finger exercises and upload your pset into 100L.
Thank you! Will I have to do the check-off for Pset 1 again?
